mapper.select: select sender, receiver, content, TO_CHAR(writedate,'yyyymmddhh24miss') writedate, user_image from oc_msg, oc_user where receiver = #{receiver} and oc_msg.sender = oc_user.user_id order by writedate desc

select sender, content, TO_CHAR(writedate,'yyyymmddhh24miss') writedate, user_image from oc_msg, oc_user where (sender, writedate) IN (select sender, max(writedate) from oc_msg where receiver = #{receiver} group by sender) and oc_msg.sender = oc_user.user_id
select count(read) from oc_msg where receiver = #{receiver} and read = 0
